Game.Name: Konjiki no Gashbell!! The Card Battle for GBA (Japan)
Game.plot: Konjiki no Gashbell!! The Card Battle for GBA is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Banpresto,which was released in Japan in 2005.Cheat: FacePassSome FacePass aren't obtainable in-game, and they grant you extra cards:Cheat: FacePass(G=Gash Bell, T=Tio, K=Kanchome, U=Umagon, B=Brago)
